products.title: Orient Faux Silk White Roman Blind
products.description: Their orient faux-silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This white faux-silk roman blind, introduces a bright whiteto your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting, darkaccessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Faux Suede White Roman Blind
products.description: Create a spacious and chic interior with their white faux suede roman blind. Their faux suede deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular fabrics for roman blinds and curtains. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. This blind is great at creating contrast but is also fantastic on its own creating that minimalist look highly sought after in todays living.

products.title: Panama White Roman Blind
products.description: Their panama range is available in a full rainbow of colours so we are sure you will find the shade to compliment your dcor and interior design style. This classic white roman blind is made from 100% cotton and is the perfect addition to freshen up any room in your home. The classic white material is great to coordinate with a diverse range of colours and is therefore a great candidate for a mix and match interior.

products.title: Velvet Canvas Cream Roman Blind
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in canvas cream, introduces a warm-toned cream hue to your home.
